thread.title: BRIEF-Och-Ziff Capital Says, Estimated Unaudited Amount Of Assets Under Management Was About $33.3 Billion

title: BRIEF-Och-Ziff Capital Says, Estimated Unaudited Amount Of Assets Under Management Was About $33.3 Billion
text: March 2, 2018 / 12:39 PM / Updated 4 minutes ago BRIEF-Och-Ziff Capital Says, Estimated Unaudited Amount Of Assets Under Management Was About $33.3 Billion Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 2 (Reuters) - Och-Ziff Capital Management Group Llc : * OCH-ZIFF CAPITAL MANAGEMENT GROUP SAYS AS OF MARCH 1, ESTIMATED UNAUDITED AMOUNT OF ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT WAS ABOUT $33.3 BILLION - SEC FILING * OCH-ZIFF CAPITAL MANAGEMENT GROUP SAYS ESTIMATED UNAUDITED AUM OF ABOUT $33.3 BILLION AS OF MARCH 1, REFLECTS NO CHANGE SINCE FEBRUARY 1, 2018 Source text ( bit.ly/2FKDWDT ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
